title: Bai Bian Baobei
synopsis: Dudu and Haha, who lived in a colorful life in a big city, were entrusted by their parents to their grandmother's house who lives in the fringe of the city during the summer vacation. Although grandma liked them very much, they had the idea of going home in the face of a strange and boring environment. Inadvertently broke into the basement that had been sealed for a long time, and met the cat princess Satsuki. She was in a panic, haha, and helped Satsuki solve the difficulties smoothly. Satsuki asked them to eat ice cream to thank them. The next day, Dudu and Haha finally waited till dawn, and then sneaked into the basement. Seeing the dreamy Xiaoyue, they joyfully knew that everything yesterday was true. All stories will unfold from this... (translated from douban)
